attributes.action: Make Public Sexual Harassment a Criminal Offence in the UK
attributes.additional_details: To make people feel safer in public, especially when walking alone or at night.
attributes.background: Make Public Sexual Harassment a Criminal Offence in the UK. e.g catcalling and groping

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578940
